gurmukhi: ਚੰਦ੍ਰਾਨਨ ਚਾਰੇ ਨਰਕ ਨਿਵਾਰੇ ਪਤਿਤ ੳੁਧਾਰੇ ਮੁੰਡ ਮਥੇ ॥
transliteration: Channdraanan Chdare Narak Nivdare Patit Udhdare Mounnd Mathe||
translation: Thy face is more winsome than moon, Thou art the Protector from hell and liberator of the sinners, O the masher of the demon Mund.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਮਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਧੂਮ੍ਰ ਬਿਧ੍ਰੰਸਨਿ ਅਾਦਿ ਕਥੇ ॥੧੯॥੨੨੯॥
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Dhoomra Bidhounsan(i) Aadh Kathe||19||229||
translation: Hail hail O Slayer of Mahishasura! O Destroyer of Dhumar Lochan, Thou hast been described as the Primal Deity. 19.229.

gurmukhi: ਰਕਤਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਚੰਡ ਚਕਰਦਨ ਦਾਨਵ ਅਰਦਨ ਬਿੜਾਲ ਬਧੇ ॥
transliteration: Rakatyaasur Mardan Channd Chakardan Daanav Ardan Bidaal Badhe||
translation: O Stayer of the demon Rakatvija, O the masher of the demon Chand, O the Destroyer of the demons and the killer of the demon Bridal.

gurmukhi: ਸਰ ਧਾਰ ਬਿਬਰਖਣ ਦੁਰਜਨ ਧਰਖਣ ਅਤੁਲ ਅਮਰਖਣ ਧਰਮ ਧੁਜੇ ॥
transliteration: Sar Dhaar Bibarkhan Durjan Dharkhan Atul Amarkhan Dharam Dhuje||
translation: Thou causest the rain of shafts and also makest the vicious people to swoon, Thou art the Deity of Immeasurable ire and Protector of the banner of Dharma.

gurmukhi: ਧੂਮ੍ਰਾਛ ਬਿਧੁੰਸਨਿ ਸ੍ਰੌਣਤ ਚੁੰਸਨ ਸੁੰਭ ਨਪਾਤ ਨਿਸੁੰਭ ਮਥੇ ॥
transliteration: Dhoomraachh Bidhounsan(i) Sraounat Chounsan Soundh Napaat Nisounbh Mathe||
translation: O Destroyer of the demon Dhumar Lochan, O the blood-drinker of Rakatvija, O the killer and masher of the demon-king Nisumbh.

gurmukhi: ਜੈ ਜੈ ਹੋਸੀ ਮਹਿਖਾਸੁਰ ਮਰਦਨ ਅਾਦਿ ਅਨੀਲ ਅਗਾਧ ਕਥੇ ॥੨੦॥੨੩੦॥
transliteration: Jai Jai Hosoo Mahikhaasur Mardan Aadh Anool Agaddh Kathe||20||230||
translation: Hail, hail, O slayer of Mahishasura, described as Primal, Stainless and Unfathomable. 20.230.

gurmukhi: ਤੁਮ ਕਹੋ ਦੇਵ ਸਰਬੰ ਬਿਚਾਰ ॥ ਜਿਮ ਕੀਓ ਅਾਪ ਕਰਤੇ ਪਸਾਰ ॥
transliteration: Toum Kaho Dev Saraban Bichaar|| Jim Ko( i)  Aap Karte Pasaar||
translation: I relate to thee all the thoughts, O Gurudeva (Or O Gurudeva! Tell me all the musings) how the Creator created the expanse of the world?

gurmukhi: ਜੱਦਪਿ ਅਭੂਤ ਅਨਭੈ ਅਨੰਤ ॥ ਤੳੁ ਕਹੋ ਜਥਾ ਮਤ ਤ੍ਰੈਣ ਤੰਤ ॥੧॥੨੩੧॥
transliteration: Jaddap(i) Abhoot Anbhai Anant|| Tau Kaho Jathaa Mat Train Tant||1||231||
translation: Although the Lord is Elementless, Fearless and Infinite, then how did He extend the texture of this world? 1.231.

gurmukhi: ਕਰਤਾ ਕਰੀਮ ਕਾਦਰ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾਲ ॥ ਅਦ੍ਵੈ ਅਭੂਤ ਅਨਭੈ ਦਿਅਾਲ ॥
transliteration: Kartaa Daroom Kaadar Kridaal|| Advai Abhoot Anbhai Diaal||
translation: He is the Doer, Beneficent, Mighty and Merciful He is Non-dual, Non-Elemental, Fearless and Benign.

gurmukhi: ਦਾਤਾ ਦੁਰੰਤ ਦੁਖ ਦੋਖ ਰਹਤ ॥ ਜਿਹ ਨੇਤਿ ਨੇਤਿ ਸਭ ਬੇਦ ਕਹਤ ॥੨॥੨੩੨॥
transliteration: Daataa Durant Doukh Dokh Rahat|| Jih Net(i)( Net(i) Sabh Bed Kahat||2||232||
translation: He is the Donor, Endless and devoid of sufferings and blemishes. All the Vedas call Him ‘Neti, Neti’ (Not this, Not thisl….Infinite).2.232.

gurmukhi: ਕੲੀ ੳੂਚ ਨੀਤ ਕੀਨੋ ਬਨਾੳੁ ॥ ਸਭ ਵਾਰ ਪਾਰ ਜਾ ਕੋ ਪ੍ਰਭਾੳੁ ॥
transliteration: Kaee Ooch Nooch Koono Banaao|| Sabh Vaar Paar Jaa Ko Prabhaao||
translation: He hath Created many beings in upper and lower regions. His Glory is spread in all places here and there.

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਜੀਵ ਜੰਤ ਜਾਨੰਤ ਜਾਹਿ ॥ ਮਨ ਮੂੜ ਕਿੳੁ ਨ ਸੇਵੰਤ ਤਾਹਿ ॥੩॥੨੩੩॥
transliteration: Sabh Jeev  Jant Jaanant Jaah(i)|| Man Moond Kio Na Sevant Taah(i)||3||233||
translation: All the being and creatures know Him. O foolish mind! Why dost thou not remember Him? 3.233.

gurmukhi: ਕੲੀ ਮੂੜ੍ਹ ਪਾਤ੍ਰ ਪੂਜਾ ਕਰੰਤ ॥ ਕੲੀ ਸਿੱਧ ਸਾਧ ਸੂਰਜ ਸਿਵੰਤ ॥
transliteration: Kaee Moondh Paatra Poojaa Karant|| Kaee Siddh Saadh Sooraj Sivant||
translation: Many fools worship the leaves (of Tulsi plant). Many adepts and saints adore the Sun.
